Title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
Writer: David Morrell (based on characters created by), Kevin Jarre (story by), Sylvester Stallone (screenplay by), James Cameron (screenplay by)
Actors: Sylvester Stallone, Richard Crenna, Charles Napier, Steven Berkoff
Plot: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 4 nominations.
